mapper.sql: PKID, PART_CODE, CASE_CODE, PRICING_TIME, TAX_PRICING, HOUSE_PROPERTY
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_PRICING (PKID, PART_CODE, CASE_CODE, PRICING_TIME, TAX_PRICING, HOUSE_PROPERTY, COMMET) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taxPricing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{houseProperty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{commet,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_PRICING
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICING_TIME = #{pricingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TAX_PRICING = #{taxPricing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOUSE_PROPERTY = #{houseProperty,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
COMMET = #{commet,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
